settings.sub_title: LINEUP • SCHEDULE • TRAVEL • VENUES • FAQ & INFO

settings.data:
LEVITATION is back this Halloween weekend, OCTOBER 26-29, 2023! The first wave of lineup news has been released. 4 Day Passes & Single Show Tickets are available now!


BUY 4 DAY PASSES & TICKETS

settings.text2:
For over a decade, LEVITATION has delivered lineups that span psych, dream pop, punk, indie, metal, darkwave and electronic music – helping carry the spirit of 1960’s sonic experimentation into modern times.

2023 further expands the sonic spectrum and scope of the event, adding new venues and experiences to the mix.

Grab your tickets and we'll see you in October!

2023 brings a new central hub downtown at 809 E 6th St to chill,
have a beverage and listen to some tunes before or between shows!
FREE HAPPY HOURS & SAMPLING!
HOURS : OCT 26 - 29, 2023 - 1pm - 7pm daily!

Hit the RSVP link to reserve your spot:

OFFICIAL PLAYLIST

settings.data:
VENUES

In 2023, LEVITATION expands the sonic spectrum and scope of the event with an eclectic lineup and the addition of two of Austin's newest independent venues: electronic music destination Concourse Project, and South Austin’s outdoor, multi-stage event center The Far Out Lounge, where Austin Psych Fest was held in April.

These new locations are in addition to LEVITATION’s traditional Red River and East Side venues, including the festival’s downtown main stage Stubb’s, and Red River and Eastside staples Mohawk, Empire, Hotel Vegas, Elysium, Parish, Antone’s and 13th Floor.

settings.text2: The festival's downtown main stage.  This historic venue on Red River has been voted one of the top 50 music venues in the country and serves up great BBQ, too. Stubb’s Waller Creek Amphitheater is an open air stage with a large canopy that's perfect for projections and visuals to accompany the music on stage. Looking forward to more epic shows at this Austin music landmark!

The Far Out Lounge has Old Austin vibes and a giant backyard with two stages under the trees and Texas sky. The venue has a 100 year history of live music, including the return of Austin Psych Fest in 2023. We love this venue and LEVITATION 2023 will host some of its largest shows and headliners on the dual stages at Far Out.

The Concourse Project is an electronic music destination a short drive from downtown, located by the south terminal of the airport. We're excited to host two massive LEVITATION events in this cavernous warehouse style space, which features state-of-the-art sound and light production.

Mohawk is a landmark music venue & has hosted countless amazing shows in its decade years of operation, including Austin Psych Fest in 2010. The main stage has multiple viewing decks and the inside stage is the perfect spot to catch your next favorite band.

Empire features two stages along with a great patio, a massive sound system and a great setup for projections and visuals. A diverse array of talent has played Empire and the venue has played host to many Levitation events over the years.

Hotel Vegas has been the beating heart of Austin's underground music scene for over a decade. Rock n roll club inside, with a tree covered patio facing the main stage in the backyard. Located in the heart of the East Sixth Street arts + entertainment district on Austin's East Side, next to neighboring sister bars The Volstead Lounge and Lolo Wine.

In its newest chapter, Parish has been rebranded and relocated to 501 Brushy Street in the heart of Austin, Texas. Independent promoters Resound Presents have breathed new life into the space formerly occupied by The North Door, preserving yet reviving the beloved old Austin haunt. The venue features a wrap around balcony so get there early for the best views!

Elysium Nightclub has been hosting Austin’s alternative nightlife since 2001. Located in the Red River district, Elysium is one of the longest standing residents to date to serve as an event venue and dance club. Complimentary entry with any LEVITATION ticket for 80s night on Sunday, Oct 29!

Established in 1975 by the late Clifford Antone, Antone’s is an iconic blues venue located in downtown Austin. Over the past 40 years, Antone’s has hosted a mind blowing number of legends including B.B. King, Muddy Waters, Ray Charles, and James Brown. We're pleased to present LEVITATION shows in this legendary club!

Our neighborhood rock and roll bar! Co-founded by Jake Garcia of the Black Angels who describes it as “a cool little rock & roll bar to concentrate on the culture of where psychedelic music began. This is our dedication to Roky Erickson, The 13th Floor Elevators and the Golden Dawn.” 13th Floor hosts a permanent collection of signed posters & rare LEVITATION memorabilia, late night shows and 4 Day wristband pickup!

settings.data:
FAQ & INFO

Crucial info and answers to common questions - we'll keep this updated as we approach the festival weekend:

WHEN AND WHERE IS LEVITATION?

OCT 26-29, 2023 - Austin, Texas.

For 2023, LEVITATION expands with the addition of two of Austin's newest independent venues: electronic music destination The Concourse Project, and South Austin’s outdoor, multi-stage event center The Far Out Lounge, where Austin Psych Fest was held in April.

These new locations are in addition to LEVITATION’s traditional Red River and East Side venues, including the festival’s downtown main stage Stubb’s, and Red River and Eastside staples Mohawk, Empire, Hotel Vegas, Elysium, Parish, Antone’s, and 13th Floor.

For more info on the venues, check out the VENUES section above.


When and where can I purchase tickets?

Tickets are available now online HERE!

If the shows are not sold out, tickets will also be available to purchase at the doors of each show. Most shows sell out each year, so we highly recommend buying in advance.


WHAT ARE THE TYPES OF TICKETS?

SINGLE SHOW TICKETS : $18-$55 + tax and fees

4 DAY PASS : $395 + tax and fees

Includes: Guaranteed access to all LEVITATION 2023 events at the following 5 venues: STUBB'S, FAR OUT, MOHAWK, EMPIRE, THE CONCOURSE PROJECT and HOTEL VEGAS.*

DELUXE 4 DAY PASS : $795 + tax and fees

Includes: Guaranteed access to all LEVITATION 2023 events at 9 venues: STUBB'S, FAR OUT, THE CONCOURSE PROJECT, MOHAWK, EMPIRE, HOTEL VEGAS, ELYSIUM, PARISH, and ANTONE'S.*
Late night shows at 13th Floor are subject to capacity.

An exclusive screen printed poster, only for DELUXE 4 DAY PASS holders.

Deluxe Upgrades at all four shows at Stubbs & The Far Out Lounge, which include:
– Access to exclusive lounge, private bar & elevated viewing platform at rear of venue
– Access to viewing area by front of venue (limited space available)
– Private bathrooms
– Express entry
– Complimentary food & non-alcoholic drinks

*Please note that shows at STUBBS and FAR OUT run simultaneously and that the venues are a 20-25 minute drive apart.

*Guests must arrive to the venue within 1 hour of door times for guaranteed access. After the first hour, access may be subject to capacity, although during LEVITATION 2022 no one was turned away.

- - -
Select shows outside these venues may be ticketed separately.
All shows at the 13th Floor are ticketed separately.

Show is rain or shine. No refunds.

Where & when can I pick up 4 DAY WRISTBANDS?

Wristband pickup instructions will be posted at a later date. Stay tuned.

SHOULD I RECEIVE AN EMAIL WITH MY ORDER CONFIRMATION?

Yes. If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder. If you have not received your confirmation or are having any other technical ticketing-related issues with your order, contact our ticketing partner See Tickets.

I HAVE AN ISSUE WITH MY ORDER – WHERE CAN I GET HELP?

For all issues regarding ticket orders, please read See Ticket’s Knowledge Base HERE and see if you can find an answer to your question.

If you still have questions, please contact See Tickets directly and submit a request to their Customer Support team HERE . Be sure to have your ticket confirmation number ready.

CAN I UPGRADE MY GENERAL ADMISSION TICKET TO A DELUXE TICKET?

Yes, as long as Deluxe Passes or Tickets are still available for the show you want to upgrade, we can process this for you. To upgrade, purchase your new ticket and contact us to request a refund for the original General Admission ticket. The full price of the original ticket including all fees will be refunded. To request a refund, submit a request to the Customer Support team HERE.

I WANT TO BUY A 4 DAY PASS, BUT I ALREADY BOUGHT A SINGLE DAY TICKET – CAN I UPGRADE?

Absolutely! Purchase your new 3 Day Pass contact us to request a refund of the original General Admission ticket. The full price of the original ticket including all fees will be refunded. To request a refund, submit a request to the Customer Support team HERE.

I CAN NO LONGER ATTEND, CAN I GET A REFUND?

Unfortunately we cannot offer refunds. This is the industry standard for live music events – when you buy a ticket it’s yours to keep. If you would like to get rid of your ticket, you can use the Official Lyte Ticket Exchange HERE.

TICKETS ARE SOLD OUT TO THE SHOW I WANT TO GO TO. WHERE CAN I GET THEM?

There is one legitimate place for resold / 3rd party tickets, via the Official Lyte Ticket Exchange HERE.. Anything else may be a scam, please be wary of anything that sounds too good to be true! Bots and scammers run rampant on social media.

I WANT TO GIVE MY TICKET TO SOMEONE ELSE, HOW DO I DO THAT?

To transfer a ticket to another person, login to See Tickets and update the order with the new attendees information. For more information, visit this PAGE HERE.

CAN I LEAVE THE VENUES ONCE I ENTER?

If you are 21+, you will be able to leave the festival venues and return. If you are under 21, you cannot re-enter the venue after you leave. Access is subject to venue policy. Please visit the venue door staff if you plan to leave and return.

Are there any age restrictions?

LEVITATION is an ALL AGES event.

All attendees must present a valid ID.

Patrons under the age of 18 must be accompanied by a parental guardian.

Children 8 years old and under do not require a ticket to attend the show.

What are the accepted forms of ID?

– State Issued Driver’s License
– Passport
– US Uniformed Services ID Card
– Foreign Driver’s License
– Expired Driver’s License AND State-Issued Temporary (Paper) ID

If you have any additional questions please contact the venue.

Where can I park?

Metered on-street parking and private lot parking is available in the area. We strongly advise carpooling, ride sharing and taxis to make sure you get home safely!

Do you take credit or debit cards?

Yes, the venue be equipped to accept all traditional forms of payment.

IS LEVITATION ADA ACCESSIBLE?

Yes, and the exact accessibility specifications are venue-based. Please contact each venue for full details. Although the venue itself should be your first point of contact for any questions, the safety and enjoyment of our guests is of great importance to us both personally and as a business. Should you have any concerns and feel the need to contact us directly for any reason, please don’t hesitate to do so.

What about safety and medical needs?

If you need medical attention, please alert venue staff or member of security staff to assist you. In the event of an immediate safety concern or medical emergency, please call 9-1-1. A safe environment is a top priority for all of us in the Austin music community.

If you ever have an issue that you feel were not properly addressed or want to voice any concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact us, anonymously or otherwise, as we’ll be respectful of your privacy regardless.

Can I bring a camera?

Disposable, small digital photography and removable lens cameras will be allowed. No flash photography allowed. Audio and video recording devices are prohibited.

Additionally, please be respectful of other patrons and the artists when using your camera. Attendees who are not respectful of other attendees’ view and personal space will be asked to leave.

What can I bring and what is prohibited?

Rules and acceptable items may vary from venue to venue, but here’s a general list:

What’s ACCEPTABLE: Small purse or backpack, cameras. Please remember, everyone is subject to search and photography policies can vary from artist to artist.

What’s PROHIBITED: No chairs, no music instruments or equipment, alcohol, outside food or drink (including sealed water bottles), weapons, firearms, projectiles including glowsticks, video recording equipment, tri-pods, audio recording equipment and unauthorized merchandise.

Any person attempting to enter the venues with any of the prohibited item(s) above will be refused access, or at the venue’s discretion, allowed to give up the prohibited item(s) before entry. Confiscated items will be disposed of or given away at the venue’s discretion.

Contacting LEVITATION

If you still have questions please email us here: info@levitation.fm

For all inquiries regarding: Press, Partnerships, Sponsorships, Work Online Store Customer Service and Record Label Inquiries, go HERE for a list of contacts.
